Name: The Greater Valkyrate
Details:
The Greater Valkyrate is the union of two breakaway factions from the Oberon Confederation, namely Butte Hold and Morgraine's Valkyrate. Formed in 3028, this Bandit Kingdom has served as a significant threat to the Oberon Confederation, effectively keeping the confederation in check.

It is noteworthy that the Greater Valkyrate places emphasis on the dominance of women over men.
